entities.name: fred weasley

entities.name: george weasley

entities.name: harry

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as following Harry.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is mentioned as one of the boys who had reached the dormitory first and were covering the walls with posters and photographs.

entities.name: west ham

relationships.description: Fred and George are described as twins, indicating a familial relationship.
Harry is mentioned as waving good night to Dean, suggesting a friendly relationship.
Harry is mentioned as entering the dormitory where Dean and Seamus were already present, indicating a friendly relationship.
Dean is wearing West Ham's colors, indicating an affiliation with the team.
